pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Simple Message BotThis bot is designed to send a custom direct message to a user on discord.## Example```pythonimport asynciofrom message import send_direct_messageasync def my_script(): # Your script code goes here await send_direct_message(TOKEN, USER_ID, "Hello, World!")async def main(): await my_script()asyncio.run(main())```### WhyI wanted an easy way to get remote notfications from scripts
